attributes.action: £1000 bonus for all England care workers
attributes.additional_details: Wales have been given nearly £2000 for working threw the pandemic but England have been given nothing.
attributes.background: Pay £1000 bonus to all England care workers

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Fund a £500 bonus for social care workers in England: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/601509
